name: InfluxDB 3.0
shortDescription: Read from InfluxDB 3.0 and publish to Quix streams

Variables.Name: output
Variables.Description: This is the Quix topic that will receive the stream

Variables.Name: task_interval
Variables.Description: Interval to run query. Must be within the InfluxDB notation; 1s, 1m, 1h, 1d, 1w, 1mo, 1y

Variables.Name: INFLUXDB_HOST
Variables.Description: Host address for the InfluxDB instance.

Variables.Name: INFLUXDB_DATABASE
Variables.Description: Database name in InfluxDB where data is stored.

Variables.Name: INFLUXDB_MEASUREMENT_NAME
Variables.Description: The InfluxDB measurement to read data from. If not specified, the name of the output topic will be used
